name: Nth State
description:
|| Nth State ||

This is a jam submission for GAME3033

Student Name: Bohan Cheng

Student#: 101130599

HOW TO PLAY

Rotate the world and touch both goals to win the game.

Blue plate on the ground can boost the player into the air.

Challenge yourself to find the shortest way to achieve goals.

Controls:

Use 'A' and 'D' or arrow keys to rotate left and right.

'Escape' key to pause.
